import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MousepositionService } from '../pdpcharacter/service/mouseposition.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private mousepositionService:MousepositionService){ } protected userCredintiels: { userEmail: String; userPassword: String } = { userEmail: '', userPassword: '', }; protected onMouseMove(event:MouseEvent){ this.mousepositionService.setMousePosition(event.clientX,event.clientY) console.log("hi "+event.clientX+event.clientY); } }
